section.title: BerliOS
section.p: You can browse the current bugs for any of the modules in Simetron and the hosted subprojects in our berlios project: berliOS bug database
Alternatively, if you would like to submit a patch against an existing bug, or if you just have created a patch to extend some functionality, please use the berliOS patch submission interface.
We highly welcome code snippets. Please use the developers mailing list for these purposes.
